name: Product Hunt
description: A platform to discover and share the latest tech products.

name: ChatGPT
description: An AI language model that can generate human-like text based on prompts.

name: Slack
description: A messaging app for teams that brings all your communication together in one place.

name: Notion
description: An all-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, wikis, and databases.

name: Figma
description: A cloud-based design tool for creating interfaces and collaborating in real-time.

name: Among Us
description: A multiplayer game where players work together to complete tasks while impostors try to eliminate them.

name: Zoom
description: A video conferencing tool that allows you to meet with others virtually.

name: VS Code
description: A source-code editor made by Microsoft for Windows, Linux, and macOS.
